name: An outdated stonks game
description:
Every 0.5 seconds the number of Stonks decreases. You need to get to the end, before it drops to 0. Watch out, because enemies decrease the number of stonks when they touch you.

All of the music and sound effects are used under Creative Commons 0 licence https://creativecommons.org/publicdomain/mark/1.0/   and can be found on https://freesound.org/
